SENT.plain: We evaluated cognitive dysfunction in BehÃ§et's disease (BD) with and without neurological manifestations by P300 and neuropsychological tests
Thirty-four BD patients without neurological manifestations, eighteen BD patients with neurological manifestations and 15 controls were studied
P300 potentials and neuropsychological tests were performed
P300 latency values and neuropsychological tests were not significantly different from the normal controls in BD patients without neurological manifestations
In neurologically symptomatic patients attention and memory deficits and delayed P300 potentials were found
